field.name: time_of_flight
field.doc: A list of time of flight for each event as it comes in. This list is for all pulses with information to attach to a particular pulse located in events_per_pulse.

field.name: pixel_number
field.doc: There will be extra information in the NXdetector to convert pixel_number to detector_number. This list is for all pulses with information to attach to a particular pulse located in events_per_pulse.

field.name: pulse_time
field.doc: The time that each pulse started with respect to the offset

field.name: events_per_pulse
field.doc: This connects the index "i" to the index "j". The jth element is the number of events in "i" that occurred during the jth pulse.

field.name: pulse_height
field.doc: If voltages from the ends of the detector are read out this is where they go. This list is for all events with information to attach to a particular pulse height. The information to attach to a particular pulse is located in events_per_pulse.
